content: Promenade in Singapore The **Queen Elizabeth Walk** is a [promenade](/wiki/Promenade) located at the [Esplanade Park](/wiki/Esplanade_Park) within the [Downtown Core](/wiki/Downtown_Core) district of the [Central Area](/wiki/Central_Area,_Singapore) of Singapore. - [History of Singapore](/wiki/History_of_Singapore) - National Heritage Board (2002), *Singapore's 100 Historic Places*, Archipelago Press, [ISBN](/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)) 981-4068-23-3 - Victor R Savage, Brenda S A Yeoh (2004), *Toponymics - A Study of Singapore Street Names*, Eastern University Press, [ISBN](/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)) 981-210-364-3 - Singapore Government eCitizen website 1°17′17″N 103°51′03″E﻿ / ﻿1.2880°N 103.8508°E﻿ / 1.2880; 103.8508 This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Queen Elizabeth Walk
